Uses of Package
com.sri.kernel.modules

Packages that use com.sri.kernel.modules
com.sri.kernel Provides the core classes of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.modules Contains classes which make up the module system of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.modules.beacon Provides the module Beacon, an interface to the Triangulation hardware. 
com.sri.modules.health Provides the module Health, an interface to the Diagnostic system. 
com.sri.modules.httpd Provides the module Httpd, a simple web server. 
com.sri.modules.magellan Provides the module Magellan, offering high level navigation. 
com.sri.modules.mail Provides the module Mail, a simple mail server and client. 
com.sri.modules.modutils Provides the module Modutils, an interface to the kernel module system. 
com.sri.modules.oopic Provides the module OOPic, an interface to the OOPic microcontroller. 
com.sri.modules.sample Provides the module Sample, a sample module. 
com.sri.modules.speech Provides the module Speech, an interface to the Text to Speech hardware. 
com.sri.modules.srml Provides the module SRML, a collection of basic SRML elements. 
com.sri.modules.userpanel Provides the module UserPanel, an interface to the robots User Panel. 
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel.modules used by com.sri.kernel
Module
           A base type of module.
ModuleInfo
           This is the main data structure to encapsulate a module.
ModuleList
           This module maintains the list of modules, both loaded and not loaded.
ModuleLoader
           This provides the core module loading capability to the SR4 Kernel.
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel.modules used by com.sri.kernel.modules
Module
           A base type of module.
ModuleData
           This data structure is used to package data available to modules from the SR4 Kernel.
ModuleDependencyException
           Used when a module dependency cannot be resolved.
ModuleException
           Used when a general module error has occoured.
ModuleInfo
           This is the main data structure to encapsulate a module.
ModuleList
           This module maintains the list of modules, both loaded and not loaded.
ModuleLoader
           This provides the core module loading capability to the SR4 Kernel.

           This provides a generic interface to the Module class.
